doc.title: Juippiki no neko
doc.plot: A gang of eleven cats have stolen a fish and they're banned out of the town. They can't find no food and are very hungry. Than an old cat tells the gang about a fish as big as a house. The gang decides to go and find that fish. Unfortunately ten cats get tired and only the leader wants to continue. After a quarrel they split up and every cat goes his own way, looking for the big fish.
